text.name: system_description
text.text: The Casio PV-1000 is a video game console marketed only in Japan. It was discontinued less than a year after its release. It is powered by a Z80A microprocessor, and has 2 KB of RAM, of which 1 KB is dedicated to its character generator. It has a resolution of 256 × 192 pixels in eight colours.

text.text: Casio PV-1000 - игровая приставка, продававшаяся только в Японии. Она была снята с производства менее чем через год после выпуска.
